item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 17, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. AI PCs Aren't Good at AI: The CPU Beats the NPU (320 points | 201 comments)

26. Possible futures for the Ethereum protocol, part 2: The Surge (44 points | 16 comments)
27. FIDO Alliance publishes new spec to let users move passkeys across providers (194 points | 176 comments)
28. Medical student's apparent celiac disease responded to giardiasis treatment (210 points | 115 comments)
29. Un Ministral, Des Ministraux (193 points | 86 comments)
30. Sample what you can't compress; image auto-encoders wihtout GANs (6 points | 4 comments)
